Divine Resurgence.name: Divine Resurgence
Divine Resurgence.flavor: A pale golden light suffuses you and your allies, restoring your vigor and getting you back into the fight.
Divine Resurgence.target: You and one ally in the burst
Divine Resurgence.effect: Each target regains the use of his or her second wind. In addition, you regain the use of a cleric encounter attack power of level 20 or lower from your domain.

Winds of Victory.name: Winds of Victory
Winds of Victory.flavor: A powerful gale sweeps over the battlefield, carrying you and your allies aloft and deflecting your enemies’ attacks.
Winds of Victory.target: You and each ally in the blast
Winds of Victory.effect:
You slide each target a number of squares up to 3 + your Wisdom modifier in any direction, even into the air. A target falls if it ends this movement in the air.
    In addition, each target takes only half damage from the next attack to hit him or her before the end of the encounter.

Storm's Fury.name: Storm's Fury
Storm's Fury.flavor: Your skin becomes the gray of raging storm clouds, and you unleash a pulse of thunder that slams foes that dare to remain near you.
Storm's Fury.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls. In addition, at the start of your turn, each enemy adjacent to you takes 10 thunder damage.
Storm's Fury.sustainMinor: The effect persists until the end of your next turn.

Wall of Radiance.name: Wall of Radiance
Wall of Radiance.flavor: A spectral wall of sunlight appears before your foes, hindering their advance while soothing the injuries of your allies.
Wall of Radiance.effect: You conjure a wall that lasts until the end of the encounter. The wall can be up to 2 squares high and must be on a solid surface. Any bloodied ally who ends his or her turn in the wall regains hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier. Each square of movement by an enemy that includes one or more squares of the wall costs 4 extra squares of movement.

Solar Flare.name: Solar Flare
Solar Flare.flavor: Radiant energy erupts from your weapon, exploding in a flare of blinding light.
Solar Flare.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and the target is blinded (save ends).
Solar Flare.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is blinded until the end of its next turn.

Bulwark of Stone.name: Bulwark of Stone
Bulwark of Stone.flavor: A rocky barrier emerges from the ground at your command.
Bulwark of Stone.effect: You conjure a wall of rough stone that acts as blocking terrain. The wall can be up to 4 squares high and must be on a solid surface. While you or an ally stand on the wall or are adjacent to the wall, that character gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses. Each square of the wall has 100 hit points and crumbles into difficult terrain if it is destroyed. The whole wall crumbles into difficult terrain at the end of the encounter.

Entombing Stone.name: Entombing Stone
Entombing Stone.flavor: Stone from the ground seems to shift and flow around your foe as it rises up to claim its flesh.
Entombing Stone.firstFailedSavingThrow: The target is immobilized and dazed (save ends both).
Entombing Stone.special: A creature not touching the ground gains a +4 bonus to saving throws against this power.

Blessing of Elvenkind.name: Blessing of Elvenkind
Blessing of Elvenkind.flavor: With your deity’s blessing, you and your allies go on the hunt.
Blessing of Elvenkind.effect: You activate an aura 5 that lasts until the end of the encounter. While the aura is active, you gain a +5 power bonus to Stealth checks and a +2 power bonus to speed. Any ally who starts his or her turn in the aura gains the same bonuses until the start of his or her next turn.

Implacable Enmity.name: Implacable Enmity
Implacable Enmity.flavor: With a flick of your weapon, you abruptly engage your enemy.
Implacable Enmity.effect: You or an ally within 5 squares of you teleports to a square adjacent to the target.

Divine Inspiration.name: Divine Inspiration
Divine Inspiration.flavor: A whispered voice threads through you, bidding you to open your senses and mind to the world around you.
Divine Inspiration.trigger: You or an ally within 10 squares of you rolls initiative or makes an Insight, a Perception, or a knowledge check.
Divine Inspiration.target: You and each ally in the burst
Divine Inspiration.effect: Each target can reroll initiative if it is the beginning of the encounter and must use the second result. Until the end of the encounter, each target can reroll Insight checks, Perception checks, and knowledge checks, and must use the second result.

Dangerous Knowledge.name: Dangerous Knowledge
Dangerous Knowledge.flavor: Horrifying ideas surface within your mind and are expelled as spiritual energy that flares around your weapon.
Dangerous Knowledge.onHit: 3[W] + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Dangerous Knowledge.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Dazzling Light.name: Dazzling Light
Dazzling Light.flavor: As if the full moon had suddenly appeared above you, a silvery radiance scours your foes.
Dazzling Light.effect: Each target cannot make opportunity attacks and takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Heaven's Tear.name: Heaven's Tear
Heaven's Tear.flavor: A flash of light from the heavens crashes down on the battlefield, exploding in a brilliant burst.
Heaven's Tear.effect: The target takes cold and radiant damage equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier, and is blinded (save ends).

Rally the Troops.name: Rally the Troops
Rally the Troops.flavor: With a shout of victory, you and your allies suddenly appear in new positions to turn the tide of the battle.
Rally the Troops.target: You and each ally in the burst
Rally the Troops.effect: Each target can teleport to a square in the burst that is adjacent to an enemy.

Peacemaker's Interdiction.name: Peacemaker's Interdiction
Peacemaker's Interdiction.flavor: Uttering imprecations of divine wrath, you warn your enemies against raising sword, spell, or claw against your companions.
Peacemaker's Interdiction.effect: Until the end of the encounter, when any enemy attacks any of your allies, you can use an immediate reaction to teleport to a square adjacent to the attacking enemy and make a melee basic attack against it.

Bound by the Grave.name: Bound by the Grave
Bound by the Grave.flavor: Death links all living things, letting you join your companions’ life forces into a mystical conduit to protect one ally from harm.
Bound by the Grave.trigger: An ally within 5 squares of you takes damage from an attack.
Bound by the Grave.target: You or one other ally in the burst
Bound by the Grave.effect: The triggering ally takes no damage from the attack. The target takes damage equal to half the triggering damage. This damage ignores the target’s immunities and resistances. Any other effect of the attack is applied to the triggering ally.

Mark of Death.name: Mark of Death
Mark of Death.flavor: With a single touch, you place the mark of death upon your foes, their doom spreading from one to the other as a plague of soul-numbing pain.
Mark of Death.effect: The target takes ongoing 20 necrotic damage (save ends). Whenever the target takes this ongoing damage, your enemies adjacent to the target take ongoing 5 necrotic damage (save ends). The target cannot attempt a saving throw against this effect if any creature adjacent to it is taking ongoing necrotic damage.

Echoes of Cowardice.name: Echoes of Cowardice
Echoes of Cowardice.flavor: Your foes’ eyes widen as your divine magic amplifies their doubts into fears, leaving them vulnerable.
Echoes of Cowardice.effect: The blast creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. Enemies in the zone grant combat advantage. When any enemy that starts in the zone is pushed, pulled, or slid, that enemy falls prone at the end of the forced movement.
Echoes of Cowardice.moveAction: You move the zone up to 3 squares.
Echoes of Cowardice.sustainMinor: The zone persists until the end of your next turn.

Ruthless Assault.name: Ruthless Assault
Ruthless Assault.flavor: Divine might cloaks you in an aura that grants you strength and speeds your allies’ attacks.
Ruthless Assault.effect: You activate an aura 2 that lasts until the end of your next turn. While the aura is active, you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and a +4 power bonus to damage rolls. You and any ally in the aura can make a basic attack as a minor action once per round.
